Uses of Package
sorcer.core.dispatch

  • Packages that use sorcer.core.dispatch 
    Package Description
    sorcer.core.dispatch  
    sorcer.core.provider.rendezvous  
  • Classes in sorcer.core.dispatch used by sorcer.core.dispatch 
    Class and Description
    CatalogExertDispatcher 
    CatalogSequentialDispatcher 
    DispatcherException 
    DispatcherFactory
    This interface must be implemented by all factory classes used to create instances of subclasses of Dispatcher.
    ExertDispatcher 
    ProviderProvisionManager 
    ProvisionManager
    The ProviderProvisionManager handles the dynamic creation of OperationalStrings created from Exertions.
    SortingException
    The SortingException is thrown when the ExertionSorter finds a problem with the Flow or the dependencies in the analyzed job
    SpaceParallelDispatcher 
    SpaceTaskDispatcher
